entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
